_lightbox_goToImage.comment: Text attached to button containing an image, which you can navigate directly to in the lightbox via a thumbnail.
_lightbox_goToNextImage.comment: Text attached to button, which you can use to navigate to the next image in the lightbox gallery.
_lightbox_goToPreviousImage.comment: Text attached to button, which you can use to navigate to the previous image in the lightbox gallery.
